attributes.action: Ban Animals Performing in Circuses Across the Globe
attributes.background: Following the awful events that occurred on 8/10/18, in Germany, whereby an elephant fell off a podium at a circus, please help support the ban of cruelty to animals which is displayed through their performances in Circuses, all over the world.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for circuses or animal welfare in other countries. 

You could start a new petition asking for the Government to urge and work  with other countries to ban animals in circuses, if that's what you want to happen. 

If you want animal circuses to be banned in the UK, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225377
